title: Thai beef and mango salad
description: This recipe is perfect for the days when you don't want to spend long over the stove but still want to serve up a mouthwatering meal. Each serving provides 509kcal, 41g protein, 30g carbohydrate (of which 29g sugars), 23g fat (of which 5g saturates), 9g fibre and 1.6g salt.
ingredients: 2 baby gem lettuces or 1 small lettuce
